name: Anthony 'Ventures
description:
You ( aka Anthony) likes two things, running and chicken nuggets! 
But one faithful day, Anthony's Chicken Nuggets got scattered across the streets!

Your task? Collect all Chicken Nuggets!!!

!!! WARNING !!! This game might be hard, so beware! It's a game about percision and tactics. Also quick hint: you can hold a move button close to a wall to stop movement slowly..

Currently only 4 Levels playable..

How to install: Download the .zip file; Extract it in a folder; The game is called Anthony 'Ventures.exe  Have fun!!!
